metadata.name: AIInterview
metadata.author: LimeSurvey AI Interview Plugin
metadata.description: Adds an "AI Interview" question type to LimeSurvey. Respondents engage in a conversational AI-driven interview powered by OpenAI ChatGPT. The full conversation is saved as the question answer. Requires an OpenAI API key configured in the plugin settings.

setting.name: openai_api_key
setting.label: OpenAI API Key
setting.help: Your OpenAI API key. This is stored securely on the server and never exposed to survey respondents.

setting.name: openai_model
setting.label: OpenAI Model
setting.help: The OpenAI model to use (e.g. gpt-4o, gpt-4-turbo, gpt-3.5-turbo).
